name: Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
A : Type u_3
B : Type u_4
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring S
inst✝⁶ : Semiring A
inst✝⁵ : Semiring B
inst✝⁴ : Algebra R S
inst✝³ : Algebra R A
inst✝² : Algebra R B
inst✝¹ : Algebra S A
inst✝ : IsScalarTower R S A
x : TensorProduct R (MulOpposite A) (MulOpposite B)
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv R S A B) x) (MulOpposite.op ((TensorProduct.map ↑(MulOpposite.opLinearEquiv R).symm ↑(MulOpposite.opLinearEquiv R).symm) x))
decl:
theorem opAlgEquiv_apply (x : Aᵐᵒᵖ ⊗[R] Bᵐᵒᵖ) :
    opAlgEquiv R S A B x =
      op (_root_.TensorProduct.map
        (opLinearEquiv R).symm.toLinearMap (opLinearEquiv R).symm.toLinearMap x) :=
  rfl

name: Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv_symm_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
A : Type u_3
B : Type u_4
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring S
inst✝⁶ : Semiring A
inst✝⁵ : Semiring B
inst✝⁴ : Algebra R S
inst✝³ : Algebra R A
inst✝² : Algebra R B
inst✝¹ : Algebra S A
inst✝ : IsScalarTower R S A
x : MulOpposite (TensorProduct R A B)
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv R S A B).symm x) ((TensorProduct.map ↑(MulOpposite.opLinearEquiv R) ↑(MulOpposite.opLinearEquiv R)) (MulOpposite.unop x))
decl:
theorem opAlgEquiv_symm_apply (x : (A ⊗[R] B)ᵐᵒᵖ) :
    (opAlgEquiv R S A B).symm x =
      _root_.TensorProduct.map (opLinearEquiv R).toLinearMap (opLinearEquiv R).toLinearMap x.unop :=
  rfl

name: Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv_tmul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
A : Type u_3
B : Type u_4
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring S
inst✝⁶ : Semiring A
inst✝⁵ : Semiring B
inst✝⁴ : Algebra R S
inst✝³ : Algebra R A
inst✝² : Algebra R B
inst✝¹ : Algebra S A
inst✝ : IsScalarTower R S A
a : MulOpposite A
b : MulOpposite B
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv R S A B) (TensorProduct.tmul R a b)) (MulOpposite.op (TensorProduct.tmul R (MulOpposite.unop a) (MulOpposite.unop b)))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem opAlgEquiv_tmul (a : Aᵐᵒᵖ) (b : Bᵐᵒᵖ) :
    opAlgEquiv R S A B (a ⊗ₜ[R] b) = op (a.unop ⊗ₜ b.unop) :=
  rfl

name: Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv_symm_tmul
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
A : Type u_3
B : Type u_4
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring S
inst✝⁶ : Semiring A
inst✝⁵ : Semiring B
inst✝⁴ : Algebra R S
inst✝³ : Algebra R A
inst✝² : Algebra R B
inst✝¹ : Algebra S A
inst✝ : IsScalarTower R S A
a : A
b : B
⊢ Eq ((Algebra.TensorProduct.opAlgEquiv R S A B).symm (MulOpposite.op (TensorProduct.tmul R a b))) (TensorProduct.tmul R (MulOpposite.op a) (MulOpposite.op b))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem opAlgEquiv_symm_tmul (a : A) (b : B) :
    (opAlgEquiv R S A B).symm (op <| a ⊗ₜ[R] b) = op a ⊗ₜ op b :=
  rfl
